body:
If you provided an email address, you'll receive a confirmation email.

## What happens next

We try to respond to all complaints within 10 working days.

To check the progress of your complaint, contact {complaint_location}.
body:cy:
WELSH: Os ydych wedi darparu cyfeiriad e-bost, byddwch yn cael e-bost yn cadarnhau bod eich cwyn wedi ei hanfon.

## What happens next

We try to respond to all complaints within 10 working days.

To check the progress of your complaint, [contact the court or tribunal](https://courttribunalfinder.service.gov.uk/search/) where the issue happened.
heading: Complaint sent
